revised_title: The Tinn-Mines and Working of Tinn in Cornwall: An Exploration of Ore Extraction and Processing
tldr: Dr. Christopher Merret provides a detailed account of the Tinn-mines in Cornwall, including the extraction process, the properties of Tinn, and the various types of ores and minerals found in the region. He also discusses the dangers and challenges faced by miners, as well as the potential health risks associated with exposure to certain substances.
